name: Mara's Kaleidoscope
flavorText: Spoken of in hushed tones in the halls of the Yshari Sanctum, the kaleidoscope is one of the most coveted magical items in existence.
flavorTextHtml: Spoken of in hushed tones in the halls of the Yshari Sanctum, the kaleidoscope is one of the most coveted magical items in existence.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Prevent all Poison damage taken and heal yourself for 12% of the amount prevented. [10 - 15]%
secondary.text: Prevent all Poison damage taken and heal yourself for 12% of the amount prevented. [10 - 15]%
